name: NFT Generator
description:
Generate 10,000 NFTs with a click of a button. Mix traits and generate thousands of unique NFT artworks!


Guide:

  1. Build your traits into Variants of Components. For example: BACKGROUNDS components with Variants like: Blue, Red, Green, etc. and eg. BODIES components with Variants like: body 1; body 2, body 3 etc. + more sets of components / traits.
  2. Create one, new Master Components with Instances of each trait. Eg. One background instance + one body instance + one hat instance, etc.
  3. Select this new Master Components, run the plugin and see the magic happen.


Contribution

• Feel free to reach out to let me know about your collection – I will try to promote it.

• If the plugin helps you, smash that like button ;)

• If you want to gratify me for my work, feel free to buy me a coffee: https://ko-fi.com/kontek

• I would be flattered to be an owner of your NFT.
